name: @paperclip/proto
description: Protobuf definitions for Paperclip - shared between Rust and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run build:proto && npm run build:tsc
scripts.build:proto: mkdir -p src/generated && protoc --proto_path=src --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=../../node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_opt=esModuleInterop=true,useOptionals=messages,outputClientImpl=false,outputServices=false --ts_proto_out=./src/generated src/workspace.proto src/patches.proto src/vdom.proto
